name: valgrind.vim
summary: Navigate in the output of the memory checker valgrind
description:
Valgrind (http://developer.kde.org/~sewardj/) is an open-source memory debugger for x86-GNU/Linux. This script allows you to start valgrind from vim and easily jump to error it reports.

The script output is not very beautiful yet, but I find it already useful.

See the comments in the beginning of the script for some documentation.
install_details: Just copy the file to ~/.vim/plugin and it should work.
